project_plan.name: Weather Information Fetcher in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API.

task.name: Set up Python environment and install necessary packages
Implement the API call to fetch weather data for a given city
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Create functionality to display the fetched weather information in the terminal
Write tests for the API call and data parsing functionalities
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
